abstract: Her designs captured the freewheeling spirit of the 1960s counterculture. Among her clients were Janis Joplin, Grace Slick and Cher.
lead_paragraph: Del Pitt Feldman, whose crocheted designs embraced a homegrown technique that had been relegated to potholders and simple scarves and helped redefine it as a respected medium for fashion and art, died on Jan. 14 in Mechanicsburg, Pa. She was 90.
